tweet: The strongest FA of the Mex #altcoins for this month is $XRP.  Not $TRX Not $ADA Not $LTC Not $EOS Not $BCH  If any of these have a shot at a 3 digit % pump, it's $XRP.  And no, I don't support $XRP, I support making money.

Some label #Cardano as vaporware. We strongly disagree. Cardano envisions a robust infrastructure for critical, fail-safe functions at the heart of finance, government, law, and other operations of modern society. And these take time.  #ADA #crypto #altcoins #cryptocurency

2 things make #Cardano difficult to fully comprehend & appreciate: It’s built by the experts, for the experts, and it’s built for quality over quantity. This makes many jump ship as they are unable to understand it fully or wait to see if it’s going to realize its full potential.

#Cardano testnet is now out and some wonder if they can stake real #ADA on it. Not yet. This will be possible during the phase 3 of the testnet. You will be able to redeem your rewards in 2020, once #Shelley has launched on the mainnet.  Learn more here:  https://t.co/hemVaSDHla
